channel.title: Kicked from server now connection refused?
channel.description: i am unsure as to what happend but i ran outside at night and died like 3 times near my spawn point, as soon as i try to get my diamond boots i get kicked, i log back in, kicked again, finally i get connection refused i've waited over a minute... :| uhhhhh wtf?
